name: NFT Avatar Generator
description:
I was inspired by the Yoyo Games asset bundle to make a jab at people who think that nfts are a good idea, Click the save icon for a surprise
You can use the arrows to change the avatar, use the arrow in brackets to export and import an avatar string

(My response to NFTs and Crypto)

Ever wanted to create your own unique avatar for that nft crapchain or whatever?
WELL NOW YOU CAN!
